c.detail: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls
c.summary: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls

i.detail: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in an alcove here
i.summary: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in an alcove here

details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, magical light in most rooms)

detail.room_features: A fountain of water sits against the west wall, and a hissing noise can be heard in the east side of the room
A stone ramp ascends towards the east wall, and a ruined siege weapon sits in the west side of the room

north.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of Death, and opened by placing a coin in his open hand

detail.room_features: A chute descends from the room into the next dungeon level down, and a stone sarcophagus sits in the south-west corner of the room

north.secret: The door is concealed behind a pile of broken stone

north.desc: Trapped and Locked Strong Wooden Door (superior lock) (slides down)

south.desc: Trapped and Locked Simple Wooden Door (common lock)

south.secret: A section of wall pivots smoothly

monster:
Treasure: Hematite (6 gp),
Lapis Lazuli (11 gp),
Malachite (10 gp),
Rhodochrosite (8 gp);
hoard total 35 gp

east.desc: Trapped and Stuck Strong Wooden Door

west.desc: Secret Trapped and Locked Stone Door (good lock)
west.secret: A trap door in the floor leads to a short tunnel beneath the wall

detail.room_features: A fountain and statue of a Goddess of Darkness sits in the south side of the room, and ghostly music fills the room

west.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Strong Wooden Door

north.desc: Trapped and Stuck Simple Wooden Door

south.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and concealed behind a tapestry of ancient mythology

detail.room_features: A toppled statue lies in the south-east corner of the room, and someone has scrawled "Don't sleep" on the north wall
A group of monstrous faces have been carved into the east wall, and several pieces of rotten bread are scattered throughout the room

south.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door

west.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (common lock) (slides up)

east.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

detail.room_features: A carved stone statue stands in the east side of the room, and a briny odor fills the south-west corner of the room

north.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Stone Door (slides down)

detail.room_features: Lit candles are scattered across the floor, and a ruined gauntlet lies in the south-east corner of the room

north.secret: The door is concealed within the mouth of a gargantuan skull carved from stone

detail.room_features: A cube of solid stone stands in the south-east corner of the room, and a pile of torn paper lies in the south-east corner of the room

east.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Strong Wooden Door

west.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "The walls listen" on the south wall, and the ceiling is covered with pale stalactites
The floor is covered with dead insects, and a broken spear lies in the south-east corner of the room

south.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of Death, and opened by placing a coin in his open hand

detail.room_features: A group of monstrous faces have been carved into the west wall, and several pieces of rotten leather are scattered throughout the room

west.secret: The door is concealed within a mosaic of vile acts

north.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door

south.desc: Trapped and Stuck Simple Wooden Door (slides to one side)

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "The Crimson Council looted this place" on the east wall, and a mouldy odor fills the room

south.desc: Trapped and Locked Iron Door (common lock)

detail.room_features: A magical mirror on the north wall speaks riddles and cryptic prophecies, and the scent of ozone fills the room

contents.summary: 1 x Large Fire Elemental, Large Net Trap

east.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Good Wooden Door

south.desc: Trapped and Stuck Simple Wooden Door

detail.room_features: A tapestry of ghoulish carnage hangs from the south wall, and a fountain decorated with five water-breathing dragon heads sits in the east side of the room
Someone has scrawled "Upon the Twilight of Lightning, when sea becomes sky, the Bridge of Shields shall be found" on the north wall, and a sundered club lies in the west side of the room

south.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Good Wooden Door

monster:
Treasure: Deep Blue Spinel (400 gp);
hoard total 400 gp
detail.room_features: A chute descends from the room into a midden chamber below, and a cube of solid stone stands in the north side of the room

north.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door

west.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Good Wooden Door

detail.room_features: The floor is covered in perfect hexagonal tiles, and howling can be faintly heard near the west wall
Someone has scrawled "It is awake" on the north wall, and the ceiling is covered with bloodstains

wandering_monsters.1: 1 x Huge Animated Object, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.2: 12 x 1st Level Warrior Orc, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.3: 5 x Shocker Lizard, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.4: 4 x Owlbear Skeleton, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.5: 2 x Imp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.6: 2 x Owlbear Skeleton, scouting from another part of the dungeon
